Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in LA. Please find the event details below:
Date: Tuesday, November 18, 2014 Time: Session #1 begins @ 8:00AM/Session #2 begins @ 11:45 AM/Session #3 begins @ 2:45PM/Session #4 begins @ 4:15PM Location: JW Marriott Santa Monica Le Merigot, 1740 Ocean Ave, Santa Monica, CA 90401
{{my.Save The Date - LA:default=edit me}}
Prior to the event, please create an account on Pivotal Network <https://network.pivotal.io/>. To fully participate in the workshop, bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
